name: Crossdata
description: Crossdata output use Crossdata as a library with the available XDSession in order to save the data into persistent tables. The tables must be created previously in corresponding Crossdata catalog.

properties.tooltip: If checked, this output can be used to send error events. This feature can be configured through the errors management settings.

writer.tooltip: Specifies a Save mode. According to the desired output step (e.g. Postgres), it is possible to select not only the native Spark save modes but also an Upsert save mode that requires the setting of the primary key fields property.
